Leila Anderson (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke ọrụ ya na-eme ka ihe nkiri, ihe anya, na ihe ngosi dị mma
Njikọ ya na onye na-ese ihe Dutch Stan Wannet emepụtala ọtụtụ ọrụ ntinye ndụ n'ime afọ abụọ gara aga. Ọ bụ onye nkuzi oge na-adịghị adịte aka na arụmọrụ nke oge a na Mahadum Cape Town
na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ịmata - i.c.w
"Dinner for Three" - onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede
Ihe ntinye na arụmọrụ dị ndụ, dị ka akụkụ nke 2012 Infecting the City festival na Cape Town
Egwuregwu ndụ, vidiyo, Johannesburg, nkeji iri na isii, 2010 i.c.w
Egwuregwu, Edinburgh Fringe, nkeji iri isii, 2009
